column1: Remapping scheme for CNT probes 2x16-Parallel (Ser nrs xxx)
Mapping as included in current file taken from CNT_32Chan_remapping.xlsx. x y coords will be added later
Note probesites are arranged according to anatomical layout: probe ch29 is closest to headstage on left shank
column2: probe ch18 is at probe tip ie most ventral (at bottom of collumn)
column3: for each of these sites the corresponding Amplipex channel is shown. Shanks are ordered left to right (16 chans per shank)
